typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		DT as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		Name as string,
		DT as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 lookup(source1@Name == source2@Name,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(input(
		Name as string,
		DT as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		Name = source1@Name,
		DT = source2@Name
	)) ~> sink1
